akn:section.akn:heading: Limitations on use of funds for certain purposes

akn:content.akn:p: § 290kk–2. Limitations on use of funds for certain purposes No funds provided under a designated program shall be expended for sectarian worship, instruction, or proselytization. (July 1, 1944, ch. 373, title V, § 596B, formerly § 583, as added Pub. L. 106–554, § 1(a)(7) [title I, § 144], Dec. 21, 2000, 114 Stat. 2763, 2763A–622; renumbered § 596B, Pub. L. 119–44, title I, § 107(a)(2), Dec. 1, 2025, 139 Stat. 674.)
